title: Mastering Integrated Design of Web-Based Distance Education Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and LMS (Learning Management System) usage experience
context.additional_context: A platform optimization course for science professionals to support work-integrated learning

learning_goals: Learners can integrate and implement science experiment simulation modules into web-based platforms within three or fewer steps
Learners can operate a real-time feedback system for project collaboration in an e-Learning environment with 80% efficiency
Learners can visualize learning performance data and propose improvement strategies using platform analytics tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
